titleStmt.title: Instructions and rules to be observed by the muster-master general and his deputies and the officers of the guards of horse, foot and halberdeers, and other the officers of troops and companies of His Majesties army in this kingdom of Ireland. As also all officers, ministers and artificers of the train of artillery and wards here. By the Lord Lieutenant General and General Governour of Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Crook, printer to the Kings Most Excellent Majesty, and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer in Castlestreet,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: "Given at his Majesties castle of Dublin the first day of August, 1667.".
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
